Good Comments: Outstanding! These set the gold standard for subbing. It's now 2016, and it makes me sick to think of the garbage subs that we have to tolerate nowadays. Fan-subbing is now the domain of arseholes. Much like the guy complaining these subs are too accurate
Bad Comments: They did a good job, except that translations were too exact. A few direct translations of Japanese sayings is fine (with explanations). There just seemed to be too many here.

Good Comments: A good group. Their subs were generally good, easy to read, few typos and well implemented. I had no trouble understanding this show.
The only decent group to finish this series, though if CrystalNova ever finishes this I would download theirs over Hitode.
Good overall, a few things like an explanation of "senpai" etc was a throw off.
Pure and simple bad translation, and whoever did the karaoke for the OP and ED clearly didn't know any Japanese.
Crystal Nova are better but Hitode is the next "best" available option given Crystal Nova stopped subbing after 4 eps
Bad Comments: undefined
too many Note: on top. otherwise they followed CrystalNova style. and actually finished the whole thing. :)
There is no point in pointing out stuff in a third season also just put seniors really
Subs were good. Only complaint is that in the ED karaoke, the romaji and hiragana/kanji were incorrectly aligned with each other, making it confusing to follow along for me.
They actually finished it.
Horrible translation of opening and ending.
bright orange TL notes about EVERYTHING
